name: Radio Bebop
description:
Controls: Press the Space Bar to move your slime left and right, dodging projectiles to the sound of the beat

Radio Bebop is a radiation themed rhythm game for Mini Jam 76

Developed By:

:ead - NCSha: https://twitter.com/NCShaSSB

Music - Leen: https://twitter.com/leenjoemama

Art - Cactulio: https://twitter.com/CACTULIO

UI - Vapixel: https://vapxiel.itch.io/
